oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-08-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 22, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1037th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Ferlin Husky; Justin Tubb; Del Wood; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Ferlin Husky) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ferlin Husky) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Justin Tubb -- Almost Lonely (Justin Tubb) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- Queenie Of The Town (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Ferlin Husky announce his tour schedule -- Gone (Ferlin Husky, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Husky, Ferlin; Tubb, Justin
